tool_description: Apply the Bokeh effect (with image processing) a visually pleasing blur to an image, while also having the option to specify the shape of the lens aperture. This allows for customized and creative effects on the resulting image, providing aesthetic enhancements with various aperture shapes.
name: Bokeh effect filter
title: Bokeh effect filter

api_list.name: base64_bytes
api_list.description: The endpoint processes the uploaded image as binary data.
